title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library; chat, generate, create, push, list models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you plug any Ollama model into LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; stream, chat, pull models inside JVM apps.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama server.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for Ollama written in Rust; browse, chat, manage models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI chatbot, Next.js app, GPU Docker stacks, function-calling examples.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose snippets for running Ollama + GPU or CPU containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models on Windows/macOS/Linux.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing reproducible Ollama builds and dev shells with CUDA or ROCm.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for ollama pull.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama answers into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models via threaded messages.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP client for Ollama; GenServer-based streaming and supervision-tree friendly.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings and strongly-typed request/response structs for Ollama.
